snippet.title: Behind The beyond - Launch Trailer ( Made with UE4)
snippet.description:
This is the launch trailer of Behind the beyond

 Behind The Beyond is a thriller mystery Game which tells the story about an agent who is a victim of his own hallucinations. Throughout the game, he is perplexed between his dreams and reality. As the game goes on, you would be thrilled with the experience. 

There are no rules, you can use your own mind and complete the game. You are on your own, you know everything, and yet nothing!! You will be captivated throughout!! There will be 3 characters to play in this game, hope you like This is the first Indian made solo Indie game which is a mystery thriller....

The game will be released in November of 2018

Follow on Twitter: https://twitter.com/BhomriskaStudio

Website      https://www.bhomriskastuidos.com

Add me on LinkedIn : https://www.linkedin.com/in/sidhanthmohite-176720b5/
